name: CS2
description: CS2: Counter-Strike sequel with updated graphics, new maps, and intense team-based multiplayer gameplay. Popular in esports for its competitive and strategic FPS action.

name: Minecraft
description: Minecraft: Sandbox game where players explore, build, and survive in a blocky, pixelated world. Offers limitless creativity, diverse landscapes, and endless possibilities for adventure.

name: Valheim
description: Valheim: Viking survival game set in a procedurally generated world. Players battle mythical creatures, gather resources, and craft to thrive in a captivating Norse-inspired realm. Highlighted for its cooperative multiplayer, engaging exploration, and unique blend of survival elements.
